name: Fred War
description:
You know that friend who wins a game and becomes insufferable? How to solve this? In the arena! Winning!

Fred War is a casual shooting game, with the most unlikely weapons possible, fired by Fred and his forest animal friends inside an arena.
Catch the boxes that fall from the sky to equip yourself with a weapon and hit as many opponents as possible to score, but don't forget the clock! The one who has the most points when the timer runs out will be the winner!!

  • - Play as many times as you want
  • - Fast and fun matches
  • - 3 Game Modes
  • - Venture through several themed arenas

* Mouse and Keyboard
* Single-Player (offline)
